fn.p: The Universal Test and Treat Trial Consortium (UT 3C) is composed of the teams of five ongoing trials: the BCPP trial (ClinicalTrials.gov NCT01965470, https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT01965470), the MaxART trial (ClinicalTrials.gov NCT02909218, https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT02909218), the HPNT071 trial (PopART trial) (ClinicalTrials.gov NCT01900977, https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT01900977), the SEARCH trial (ClinicalTrials.gov NCT01864603, https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT01864603 ) and the ANRS 12249 TasP trial (ClinicalTrials.gov NCT01509508, https://clinicaltrials.gov/ct2/show/NCT01509508 ).
